name: Gorogoa

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Gorogoa/Gorogoa.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent /lang=en /sp- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI /DIR="C:/GOG games/gorogoa"
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
